import { useState } from "react"; import { FaAngleLeft, FaAngleRight, FaInfoCircle, FaMinusCircle, FaPlusCircle, FaSearch, FaShoppingCart, FaSyncAlt } from 'react-icons/fa'; import Calca from "../assets/calca.jpg"; import styles from "./productDisplay.module.css"; import productsData from "../data/products.json"; export default function ProductDisplay() { const [quantity, setQuantity] = useState(1); const [size, setSize] = useState(""); const price = 59.0; const originalPrice = 120.0; const total = quantity * price; const [currentProductIndex, setCurrentProductIndex] = useState(0); const product = productsData[currentProductIndex]; // Produto atual // Função para trocar para o produto anterior const prevProduct = () => { setCurrentProductIndex((prevIndex) => prevIndex === 0 ? productsData.length - 1 : prevIndex - 1 ); }; // Função para trocar para o próximo produto const nextProduct = () => { setCurrentProductIndex((prevIndex) => prevIndex === productsData.length - 1 ? 0 : prevIndex + 1 ); }; const sizes = [ { size: "P", quantity: 4 }, { size: "M", quantity: 6 }, { size: "G", quantity: 3 }, { size: "GG", quantity: 3 }, ]; return ( <>
